unnormalised: Arre yaar, planning Isha's engagement is stressing me out! Venue booked for 22/12/2024, but caterer needs confirmation by 15/11/2024. And the photographer's giving me time slots like 2:30 PM or 4:00 PM on that day. Seriously, why can't things just be simple? I need a chai break, stat!
normalised: Oh friend, planning Isha's engagement is stressing me out! Venue booked for twenty second december two thousand and twenty four, but caterer needs confirmation by fifteenth november two thousand and twenty four. And the photographer's giving me time slots like two thirty P M or four zero zero P M on that day. Seriously, why can't things just be simple? I need a chai break, stat!
